dcterms:creator: S. Yao
H. Chen
J. Yang
K. Narasimhan
dcterms:description: WebShop is a task set simulating a web store site where the agent is instructed to browse the site and shop for target goods. It includes over 1M products crawled from the Amazon store and about 12K product requests rewritten by crowd laborers to generate diverse instructions.
dcterms:title: WebShop

dcterms:creator: D. Zhang
L. Chen
K. Yu
dcterms:description: WikiHow is a task set based on the collaborative wiki app WikiHow, running on the interaction platform Mobile-Env. It contains navigation tasks where the agent follows instructions to navigate to required pages.
dcterms:title: WikiHow
